subject: Gate 3-4 Integration: /planning, /orchestrate
description:
Phase 2: /planning과 /orchestrate 스킬에 validation gates 통합

Gate 3 (/planning):
- Plan Agent 리뷰 전 pre_flight_checks() 호출
- Target files 존재/생성 가능 여부 검증
- Circular dependency 조기 탐지

Gate 4 (/orchestrate):
- Task 생성 전 validate_phase_dependencies() 호출
- 중복 phase ID 탐지
- 정의되지 않은 dependency 탐지

Target Files:
- .claude/skills/planning/SKILL.md (modify)
- .claude/hooks/planning-preflight.sh (create)
- .claude/skills/orchestrate/SKILL.md (modify)
- .claude/hooks/orchestrate-validate.sh (create)

Reference: .claude/skills/shared/validation-gates.sh
